title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.112 - Encounter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.112 - Encounter

State Regulations
A face-to-face contact between a patient and a provider
who has primary responsibility for assessing and treating the condition of the
patient at a given contact and exercises independent judgment in the care of
the patient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
